titlestmt.titleproper: Preliminary Inventory to the AFSCME, Local 1930 Records WAG.040

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-10-25T12:31-0400

did.unittitle: AFSCME, Local 1930 Records

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: The records consist of constitutions and by-laws, correspondence, minutes, notes, agendas, memoranda, resolutions, legal records, contract negotiations, grievance records, newspapers, publications, tapes, photographs, contact sheets, negatives and memorabilia. The records reflect the structure and functions of Local 1930 and the Local's relationship with District Council 37, AFSCME, other library locals, and with the AFL-CIO on the state and national levels. The bulk of the material dates from the presidency of David Beasley (1968-1975).

custodhist.head: Provenance
custodhist.p: The records of AFSCME Local 1930 were donated to the Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, NYU in 1979, under an agreement with Local president Sally Campbell. An additional donation of material was made by Local president Carol Thomas in 2008.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The New York Public Library Guild Local 1930 was chartered by the American Federation of State, County and Municipal Employees in April 1968. The Local represents employees in all branch libraries and research libraries of the New York Public Library system, and in the libraries of mayoral departments and agencies. The bargaining unit includes professional, non-professional and technical titles.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Contact Archivist regarding use of Disciplinary and Termination Files at the end of Series I.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
Permission to publish materials must be obtained in writing from the:
Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Elmer Holmes Bobst Library
70 Washington Square South
New York, NY 10012
Phone: (212) 998-2630
Fax: (212) 995-4225
E-mail: tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu
